Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the driver diagnosed with coronavirus threatened to spread the virus all over Nigeria.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the driver diagnosed with coronavirus actually threatened to spread the virus.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the driver diagnosed with coronavirus is the same person as the one pictured in the post, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the spokesperson of DAAR Communications Plc, who branded the claim as "fake news" and stated that the image in the post was traced to a different person who was not the Italian man's cab driver.
